alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Franklin; Fulton; Northern Lycoming; Perry; Snyder; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 22 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following areas, Adams, Bedford, Blair, Cumberland, Franklin, Fulton, Huntingdon, Juniata, Mifflin, Northern Centre, Northern Clinton, Northern Lycoming, Perry, Snyder, Southern Centre, Southern Clinton, Southern Lycoming, Sullivan, Tioga and Union. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread showers and thunderstorms are starting to diminish and the threat for flash flooding is lowering, but is not over yet. Thunderstorms may redevelop and/or travel over the same areas, increasing the flood risk. Rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible over a short duration, with locally higher amounts possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Cumberland; Franklin; Fulton; Northern Lycoming; Perry; Snyder; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga; Union
